name: ledger-sync
description: Production-ready data ingestion and reconciliation engine with modern web interface

scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m poetry install --with dev
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && python -m uvicorn ledger_sync.api.main:app --reload --reload-dir src --reload-include "*.py" --port 8000
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && python -m black src/ tests/ && python -m ruff check --fix src/ tests/
